pages.text: Through the process of Transmutation, objects can be transformed into other objects provided the requirements are met.$(br2)Blocks are transformed into blocks or items, although care must be taken to prevent potential loops.$(br2)$(warning) Recipes cannot be listed in this guide. A complete list can be found $(uses:roots:ritual_transmutation)using JEI$().
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier I$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_transmutation#multiblock)a single standing stone is required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.
A single $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stone$() of runestone or runed obsidian is required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:transmutation/SECONDS/duration) seconds, with transmutation taking place every $(ritual:transmutation/SECONDS/interval) seconds for the duration.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will try to transmute blocks within an area of $(ritual:transmutation/radius_x) and $(ritual:transmutation/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and $(ritual:transmutation/radius_y) blocks vertically.$(br2)
